title: Cute Little Decorations
p: Here are cute and simple decoration ideas that you could do to redecorate your space and fill up your place with sweet vibes~~
list: Make bows out of pink ribbons and stick them on a wall.
Get a combination of pink, transparent, and white colored balloons and make few balloon bouquets. Then, scatter these around your place.
Change your bed covers and sofa cushions covers into a 'Galentine's color palette' fitting cover.
Cut small red heart-shaped cardboards and hang them from the ceiling using threads.
Get pink and white roses and arrange small flower bouquets to put in vases your place.
Arrange an esthetic dinner table along with a Galentine's candy platter to spoil yourself.
